ModMetaData.name: Xenn Race (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Xen
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Xens mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2018390248
[img]https://i.imgur.com/wtwHAQu.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/XennRace
--- Original Description --- Xenn, a canid alien race using the Alien Framework 2.0 by Erdelf. Make sure you are using the right version of the race and framework together!
Added new heads by Diana (orassan creator) and tribal style start. (no starting research, but Xenn are high tech level - so no x3 research multiplier)
Added unique armor and guns - and more backstories - unlocked via normal research for now
added more backstories inspired by 80's action movies.
